name: Camels in Space
overview: A sort of tribute to Llamasoft games. Well, you might have guessed, this game involves Sheep. Erm, sorry, but no. I really meant Camels. You are a pink camel (Pink? What the heck? Pink?) who has landed on a strange planet. Unfortunately for your camel, it doesn't really want to stay on that hostile planet and wants to escape. Unfortunately to be able to escape you must defeat ALL 8 alien attack waves, simply by firing pulses out of your laser powered eyes. Don't let your camel get hit too many times, else it will die. This game has a sort of surprising end sequence to it as well.
